title: Episode 196: Everything Is Awfully Politicized
itunes:title: Episode 196: Everything Is Awfully Politicized
description:
One of the unintended consequences of government overreach is that everything becomes politicized. Much of the acrimony in our political environment is due to the fact that the government has (and often uses) the power to tell people how to live their lives. That power, in turn, comes from the fact that the people ask government for more and more stuff, handing over more of their power with each request.
